ParkInHost provides Unmetered offshore German 100Mbps XEN Windows VPS services at affordable prices in German (Deutschland) with 100Mbps port Speeds. ParkInHost XEN 100Mbps Windows VPS are powered by widely used software Virtuozzo Controlled by Parallels Power Panel. Virtuozzo virtualization provides better performance, scalability, density, dynamic resource management, and ease of administration than the alternatives are few advantages in ParkInHost 100 Mbps German Windows VPS.
